TopicTitle: A.M.U.R.E. A prewiev of some new parts i'm working on

Articles.Content:
Here are some parts i'm working on and id like to get every ones opinion ! I'm also going to star working on my other models later this summer butt i'll keep everyone posted.

This first model i doubles as probe landing legs and grappling devise so you probes can be landed on meteors and take surface samples.

Deployed

and disarmed

grappled to a asteroid

my command pod for 3 kerbals

I'll keep posting pictures as i advance in my models:D

I'm all so working on this drill for probes, to take surface samples. it is a very small drill that that goes with my landing legs and will be mounted like ladders so only a part will stick out of the probe

New Thread

Edited January 29, 2015 by tabaal2
Oh god i want both gimme gimme gimme!
That command pod is awesome, I really like the look of it and the texture work seems pretty phenominal.
whoa did not expect this when i saw this :cool:b

whoa did not expect this when i saw this :cool:b

You can say that again. That is one sexy capsule.
How many Kerbals will that Sexy Capsule hold?

Is the hatch off-centre?

-----

Command pods please. They're rare.

Is the hatch off-centre?

no i don't think so, its probably the angle of the picture
the KSA would like to put an order in for that command pod. We'll have our kerbs contact your kerbs
Im a pod: hoarder, junkie, fiend,addict,and head. I should write a book about it I'll call it - Diary Of A Pod fiend. I need that pod Now!

Pod looks great! I like how it has some Space Shuttle / SciFi cross theme.

Do you plan to integrate RCS and parachute in that docking port?

Is the port integrated into the pod?

Is the port retractable?

I know I'm asking a lot, but doing so would set this pod in the high-end class of what is now ALCOR pod. That is how I see finished and fully polished assets that should be in the KSP 1.0.

Don't get me wrong, I love the pod just for the way it looks right now, and I'll definitely use it when you release it despite what you integrate into it.
Gimme these landing legs right now
The pod kinda looks like the spacex Dragon, i love it!
From the title you would think this is a Modding noob's mod, but these look amazing! Keep up the good work!

have not thought about RCS on the docking port but i am working on a parachute that will come around the docking port and fill the gap. the docking port is not integrated into the pod because if people want to make different looks with different docking ports then it will be possible. and no the port is not retractable but i am working on a cap for the docking port that can be decoupled and witch you can fit escape tower on
well i am a noob in unity and ksp parts but not in modeling. Just to clear that out
and yes the Airlock is a bit of center

Im a pod: hoarder, junkie, fiend,addict,and head. I should write a book about it I'll call it - Diary Of A Pod fiend. I need that pod Now!

This. Gimme pod. kthxbye

no i don't think so, its probably the angle of the picture

No, I know the pod is rotated. I asked about the hatch, which I can't even see.
i replied about the hatch that yes its a bit of center

Love them! Subbed.

The pod looks great. Kind of a stockalike-shaped Orion pod.

The drill and landing leg parts are great too. I haven't sent a probe out to a potatoroid yet because you have to use the giant klaw and I hate having a mini probe with a huge part attached to it like that.
All parts look great! I assume you're going for a Philae look?

i replied about the hatch that yes its a bit of center

If I might make a suggestion: Center the Hatch or make it in a 15 degree incriment. The issue with the Stock MK1-2 (The 3 kerbal one) is that the hatch is off center and in a weird orientation.

I will try to make something work, but at this time it looks like the only possible place to move the airlock is straight behind the command pod because the side windows reach too close to the sides of the command pod. or ill just make the door smaller. but ill make the change
thank you and yes. my inspiration has been the philae lander
